content: What is the real line that Scarlett O'Hara says to Rhett Butler in the movie "Gone with the Wind"?

I believe the line you're referring to is "Frankly, my dear, I don't give a damn." This iconic quote was spoken by Rhett Butler to Scarlett O'Hara in the 1939 film "Gone with the Wind." It's considered one of the most famous lines in cinema history.
